import React from 'react'; import ReactDOM from 'react-dom'; class Register extends React.Component{ constructor(props){ super(props); this.state={ name:'', email:'', password:'', lastName:'', phone:'', } } handleUserInput=(event)=>{ } handleSubmit=(event)=>{ event.preventDefault(); const user =this.state; axios.post('http://localhost:8086/adduser', user ) .then((data) => { if(data.data==='User already exists') { this.setState({result:data.data}); this.setState({class:'App-error'}); this.setState({visible:'Visible'}); this.setState({conditionalcss:true}); this.setState({created:''}); }else if(data.data==='User created'){ this.setState({created: data.data }); this.props.onClick(); } }); } render(){ return (
